00017 #ifndef _VIENNACL_INNERPROD_HPP_
00018 #define _VIENNACL_INNERPROD_HPP_
00019 
00020 #include "viennacl/forwards.h"
00021 #include "tag_of.hpp"
00022 
00023 namespace viennacl
00024 {
00025   //
00026   // generic inner_prod function
00027   //   uses tag dispatch to identify which algorithm
00028   //   should be called 
00029   //
00030   namespace linalg 
00031   {
00032     #ifdef VIENNACL_HAVE_UBLAS
00033     // ----------------------------------------------------
00034     // UBLAS
00035     //
00036     template< typename VectorT1, typename VectorT2 >
00037     typename VectorT1::value_type
00038     inner_prod(VectorT1 const& matrix, VectorT2 const& vector, 
00039          typename viennacl::tools::enable_if< viennacl::is_ublas< typename viennacl::traits::tag_of< VectorT1 >::type >::value
00040                                             >::type* dummy = 0)
00041     {
00042       //std::cout << "ublas .. " << std::endl;
00043       return boost::numeric::ublas::inner_prod(matrix, vector);
00044     }
00045     #endif
00046     
00047     // ----------------------------------------------------
00048     // VIENNACL
00049     //
00050     template< typename ScalarType, unsigned int alignment1, unsigned int alignment2 >
00051     viennacl::scalar_expression< const viennacl::vector<ScalarType, alignment1>, 
00052                                  const viennacl::vector<ScalarType, alignment2>,
00053                                  viennacl::op_inner_prod >
00054     inner_prod(viennacl::vector<ScalarType, alignment1> const & vector1, viennacl::vector<ScalarType, alignment2> const & vector2, 
00055          typename viennacl::tools::enable_if< viennacl::is_viennacl< typename viennacl::traits::tag_of< viennacl::vector<ScalarType, alignment1> >::type >::value
00056                                             >::type* dummy = 0)
00057     {
00058       //std::cout << "viennacl .. " << std::endl;
00059       return viennacl::linalg::inner_prod_impl(vector1, vector2);
00060     }
00061   } // end namespace linalg
00062 } // end namespace viennacl
00063 #endif
